title: Kudos Riot for subtle plug
body: Nothing much, but I think the link from the missions in the client to the Universe site is a good start to a more integrated world.

replies.body:
It'll be interesting, imo, to see how many folks click it who had no idea Universe even existed before that.

Baby steps!
Would you ever consider embedding Universe within the client? Or would the effort-to-benefit ratio be too unappealing?

I think that there are still game-relevant features that the client needs to support and (while I love the lore side of things _dearly_) those probably should take precedence for now.  I think you're right in that the effort-to-benefit ratio will change over time - though I cannot say whether just plonking Universe into the client would be the right solution, or if smarter folks than I would come up with a more elegant way to integrate that info.

So do you work on the client or on some other art aspect? I'm fairly confused on what a Senior Level Designer is and how that job differentiates from other roles in Riot. (actually I'm also really confused in general on what roles exist and which does what).

No I don't work on League-the-game directly at all, actually.

I'm currently on the Worldbuilding team, and also doing sneaky secret things.  In the past I've done other secret things, and then I moved onto another secret team (which closed down).

So mostly I do secret things, I guess.  In Worldbuilding I've worked on the Runeterra map (and thus the Medarda Heirloom), a timeline of all canon events, I keep track of open plot hooks, champ facts, player-facing-ness, and work on various world-building background info (population, distances, currencies, tech levels - that kind of stuff).  Things that help keep everything consistent and aligned, and generally provide feedback to the other worldbuilders, artists, and writers.

My title isn't especially illuminating any more, but what kind of a title do you have when you're doing that sort of stuff AND secret things you can't even talk about??  I'm open to suggestions :)
